data.title: Time Changes by Robert Silverberg
data.meta_description: Edge of Light: Five Classic Novels in One Volume: "Time of Changes", "Downward to Earth", "Second Trip", "Dying Inside", "Nightwings" by Silverberg, Robert and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Paperback. Condition: Good. All orders are dispatched within one working day from our UK warehouse. We've been selling books online since 2004! We have over 750,000 books in stock. No quibble refund if not completely satisfied.

SingleIssueMagazine. Condition: Good to Very Good-. Vol. 31, No. 5. Edited by Ejler Jakobsson. Cover art by Gaughan for "Liaison Assignment" (novelette) by Duncan Lunan. Includes "To Fit the Crime" (novelette) by Joe W. Haldeman; "Defender of Death" (novelette) by Gordon Eklund; "A Time of Changes" (pt. 2) by Robert Silverberg; "Necessary and Sufficient" by Theodore Sturgeon; "Takeover" by Ernest Taves; "The Exorcism" by J. R. Pierce. Features: "Letters 2"; "Galaxy Stars"; "Galaxy Bookshelf" by Algis Budrys. Illustrated by Gaughan. Upper ends of wraps nibbled at edge swith small losses (see scan - rear is similar); lower edges also nibbled, but less so; mild tanning.

SingleIssueMagazine. Condition: Very Good-. Vol. 31, No. 6. Edited by Ejler Jakobsson. Cover art by Gaughan for "Price of Leisure" by David R. Bunch. Includes "Tip of the Iceberg" (novelette) by Ernest Hill; "The Message" (novelette) by James E. Gunn; "A Time of Changes" (pt. 3 of 3) by Robert Silverberg; "The No-Wind Spotted Tiger Planet" by W. MacFarlane; "The Verity File" by Theodore Sturgeon; "Falling Through the World" by Duncan Lunan; "Rate of Exchange" by Jack Sharkey; "The Buyer" by Larry Eisenberg. Ilustrated by Gaughan. Edge nicks and chips; spine a little smudged with minor stains; rear cover rubbing; minor scar to front; tanning; first page erasure.

SingleIssueMagazine. Condition: Very Good. Vol. 31, No. 5. Edited by Ejler Jakobsson. Cover art by Gaughan for "Liaison Assignment" (novelette) by Duncan Lunan. Includes "To Fit the Crime" (novelette) by Joe W. Haldeman; "Defender of Death" (novelette) by Gordon Eklund; "A Time of Changes" (pt. 2) by Robert Silverberg; "Necessary and Sufficient" by Theodore Sturgeon; "Takeover" by Ernest Taves; "The Exorcism" by J. R. Pierce. Features: "Letters 2"; "Galaxy Stars"; "Galaxy Bookshelf" by Algis Budrys. Illustrated by Gaughan. Tape at spine ends; light edgewear; a little creasing; mild tanning.

SingleIssueMagazine. Condition: Very Good+. Vol. 31, No. 6. Edited by Ejler Jakobsson. Cover art by Gaughan for "Price of Leisure" by David R. Bunch. Includes "Tip of the Iceberg" (novelette) by Ernest Hill; "The Message" (novelette) by James E. Gunn; "A Time of Changes" (pt. 3 of 3) by Robert Silverberg; "The No-Wind Spotted Tiger Planet" by W. MacFarlane; "The Verity File" by Theodore Sturgeon; "Falling Through the World" by Duncan Lunan; "Rate of Exchange" by Jack Sharkey; "The Buyer" by Larry Eisenberg. Ilustrated by Gaughan. A short foredge tear.

Condition: Good. SHIPS FROM USA. Used books have different signs of use and do not include supplemental materials such as CDs, Dvds, Access Codes, charts or any other extra material. All used books might have various degrees of writing, highliting and wear and tear and possibly be an ex-library with the usual stickers and stamps. Dust Jackets are not guaranteed and when still present, they will have various degrees of tear and damage. All images are Stock Photos, not of the actual item. book.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. Book Club Edition. Near Fine in a Very Good jacket, generally toned and rubbed, some foxing throughout. Grey boards with black ink lettering on the spine, pushed at the head. Square and firmly bound, foxed at the top edge, clean internally. Silverberg's 1971 Nebula Award-winning novel.
